name: Photorealistic Mockup: Shadows + Slides Grid
description:
We created a simple mockup to present our slide designs with photorealistic shadows in Figma — now available free for anyone to use. Simply replace the layers with your designs, customize colors & shadows, and hit export!


Update: Bonus mockups added — 5 options to choose from, with new shadows & layouts!


Featured & Similar Items:

  • Media & Press Kit (PPT)
  • Photorealistic Shadows+Slides Bundle (PSD)
